title: Export quality apparel fair at WTC
body_lines: The annual textile fair organised by the Welfare Association of the Board of Investment (BOI) was launched on Wednesday at the World Trade Centre (WTC) and will be held until 1 April. Association President Ranjan Siberia said readymade garments of export quality manufactured at factories in the investment zones will be available here. Admission fee of Rs. 50 will be charged from customers.
